title: 英國議員：是時候宣佈中國違反聯合聲明

replies.msg:
今日除咗有英國外交大臣話香港黑警開真槍係唔合比例之外

仲有英國國會工黨議員 Stephen Twigg 係 twitter 表示：
英國對香港負有特殊責任。 好喇，依家係時候宣布中國違反咗佢嘅國際義務


其實佢今日同時喺網媒 Huff Post 撰文，抽其中兩段重點出來：
......好難睇到個條約無被違反。中國外交部發言人係2017年就宣佈係「無效」而且「無任何約束力」，但英國政府仲未明確發聲明指中國違反份條約，同埋因為咁，而違反國際法..........

好喇，依家係時候宣布中國違反咗佢嘅國際義務，同埋準備用盡所有嘅政治、經濟同道德影響力去回應


麻煩大家去 follow 依位議員嘅 twitter，下面有傳送門，多謝佢為香港發聲仲有話佢知，香港時間10月1號發生過咩事，因為佢寫文嘅時候應該仲未發生黑警射學生

===== Twitter 原文 =====
My article for today's @HuffPostUK about Hong Kong @Stand_with_HK
#StandwithHK 'Britain has a special responsibility to Hong Kong. Surely, it is now time to declare that China is in breach of its international obligations,' writes @StephenTwigg

===== Huff Post 評論文章 (節錄) =====
........It is hard to see how that treaty has not been breached. A spokesperson for the Chinese Foreign Ministry in 2017 declared that it is “null and void” and “does not have any binding effect”, but the British Government is yet to make a clear statement that China is in breach of that treaty, and, as such, of international law. ........... Surely, it is now time to declare that China is in breach of its international obligations, and prepare a comprehensive response using all the political, economic and moral levers available.
